Third-Party Content and Licenses

This asset package contains third-party content used under the appropriate licenses. Details are as follows:

1. **Mobile Missiles Pack**  
   - Source: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/mobile-missiles-pack-71890  
   - Publisher: 3Dynamite (http://3dynamitemail.wixsite.com/3dynamite)  
   - License: Per the terms provided by the Unity Asset Store at the time of download. Please review the original asset page for more details.

2. **Explosion and Grinding Crash Sound**  
   - Source: https://freesound.org/s/245581/  
   - Author: waddl_e  
   - License: Creative Commons 0 (https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)  
   - No attribution required.

3. **Rocket Launch Sound**  
   - Source: https://freesound.org/s/728264/  
   - Author: Bryce835  
   - License: Creative Commons 0
(https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)  
   - No attribution required.

4. **M16 Rifle Shots Sound**  
   - Source: https://freesound.org/s/187677/
   - Author: qubodup 
   - License: Creative Commons 0
(https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)  
   - No attribution required.

By using this asset package, you agree to comply with the respective licenses provided for each third-party component.
